accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sam Zagoria National Labor Relations Board Memorabilia #6379 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6379: Sam Zagoria National Labor Relations Board Papers 6379 P: Sam Zagoria National Labor Relations Board Photographs

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 19 pins and 10 pendants - Assortment of pins and pendants representing : TUBORG; Explorer Platform; Idaho; The Old Guard of Rutgers; Town of Highland Beach, Florida; Carlsberg; Mack; N PELRA, 20 years, 1971-1991; International Federation of American Clubs; Montana; AVC; TKA; City of New Orleans; Varsity Debating; Rutgers Scarlet Barbs; TUV Eheinland; United States Conference of Mayors; Springfield, Ohio; AFL-CIO
